body: I put part 2 up on E-Hentai about 12 hours ago if you want it.  I have no idea why it's taking so long to appear here.  All my other releases were on N-Hentai within 2 hours.
Do I want more from this series, yes I do
good, but needs a femdom tag

Yes, I don't really buy Ryoma as 160cm either.  Maybe you could argue it in the height comparison page but he gets smaller and smaller as the story goes on.  By the time Konomi is holding him on page 39, he looks tiny (and I'm guessing Konomi is shorter than Hizuru, they're about the same height on page 39 but Konomi looks further away).  If we're going purely on the given numbers though, the comparisons in the note are accurate.  We have statistical data on Japanese student heights from yearly physical exams.  If Hizuru is a 17-year-old second year, she'd be in the top 1% for girls her age.  If Ryoma is a 16-year-old first year, he's in the bottom 6% for boys.

https://nbakki.hatenablog.com/entry/Distribution_of_17_Year-old_girls_Height_in_Japan_2015
https://nbakki.hatenablog.com/entry/Distribution_of_16_Year-old_Boys_Height_in_Japan_2015
That is not a 4 inch height difference
He said she was taller then he thought. I was thinking like 5’10” maybe 6’ I don’t know the conversation rate, nope 5’5”
Nice.  I can't wait for the Sequel!
